duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legislative and congressional support throughout the annual Defense Authorization and Appropriations process.

Leverage existing Planning, Programming, Budgeting, and Execution (PPBE) systems and databases to coordinate, track, report, and make appropriate analysis and recommendations to support government decisions on requirements, milestones, and progress.
Provide analysis to support the development and implementation of Navy and Marine Corps strategy and policy.
Analyze risk-based strategies for legislative processes and planning.
Analyze and track metrics for strategy implementation.
Provide analysis to identify, define, and close requirements using the legislative process.
